hero-desc-p1: I'M A FRONT-END DEVELOPER BASED IN KYIV, UKRAINE. I'M BUILDING THINGS FOR THE WEB. I LIKE NEW TECHNOLOGIES, ALWAYS SEEKING NEW KNOWLEDGE.
hero-desc-p2: CURRENTLY, I'M FOCUSING ON BUILDING ACCESSIBLE, PURPOSEFULL WEB APPLICATIONS.
vue: Progressive JavaScript Framework. An approachable, performant and versatile framework for building web user interfaces.
nuxt: The Intuitive Web Framework. An open source framework under MIT license that makes web development simple and powerful.
js: is a widely-used programming language for web development, enabling interactive and dynamic features on websites.
ts: adds additional syntax to JavaScript to support a tighter integration with your editor. Catch errors early in your editor.
vuex: is a state management pattern + library for Vue.js applications. It serves as a centralized store for all the components in an application.
pinia: the intuitive store for Vue.js Type Safe, Extensible, and Modular by design. Forget you are even using a store.
html: is the backbone of the web. It is a markup language used to structure the content of web pages.
css: is a crucial component of web development. It is used to control the presentation and styling of web pages.
contact-me-title: For more information feel free send me a message
